channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: Huluは、3月12日より、世帯外とのアカウント共有を禁止するよう加入者規約を変更したと、加入者へのEメールで発表した（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
In an email to subscribers, Hulu says the company changed its subscriber agreement to bar sharing of accounts outside the user's household, effective March 12  —  The Disney-owned streaming service changed its subscriber agreement to ban sharing of accounts outside of individual households.

item.title: メモジミー・フィンケルスタインが2023年5月に立ち上げ、約300人を雇用。
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
Memo: The Messenger shuts down, effective immediately, citing economic headwinds; Jimmy Finkelstein launched the outlet in May 2023 and hired about 300 people  —  By closing less than a year after it launched, The Messenger is now one of the biggest busts in the annals of online news.

item.title: シカゴ・トリビューンを含むトリビューン系出版社のジャーナリストたちが、オールデン・グローバル・キャピタルによる経費削減に抗議するため、2月1日の1日ストライキを計画している（Laura Wagner/Washington Post）。
item.description:
Laura Wagner / Washington Post:
Journalists from Tribune publications, including the Chicago Tribune, plan a one-day strike on February 1 to protest cost-cutting by Alden Global Capital  —  To protest the cuts made by new owner Alden Global Capital, staffs plan walkouts Thursday at the Chicago Tribune …

item.title: オーダシーはパイナップル・ストリートのポッドキャスト部門で多くのポジションを削減する予定。情報筋によると、レイオフの対象となるのは12ポジションで、スタッフの〜25％にあたるという（Ashley Carman/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Ashley Carman / Bloomberg:
Audacy plans to cut a number of positions in its Pineapple Street podcast division; a source says the layoff will affect 12 positions, or ~25% of the staff  —  Audacy Inc., a radio broadcaster reorganizing in US bankruptcy court, announced plans to cut a number of positions in its Pineapple Street podcast division.

item.title: ディズニーがフロリダ州の「ゲイと言うな」法案を批判した後、報復を主張するロン・デサンティス州知事に対するディズニーの訴えを米判事が棄却、ディズニーは控訴する予定（Dan Mangan/CNBC）
item.description:
Dan Mangan / CNBC:
A US judge dismisses Disney's suit against Gov. Ron DeSantis claiming retaliation after Disney criticized Florida's “Don't Say Gay” bill; Disney plans to appeal  —  - A judge dismissed a lawsuit Disney filed against Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis that alleged he retaliated against the company …

item.title: LAタイムズ、WSJなどが選挙の年にDC支局を削減、より収益性の高いコアコンピタンスに注力（Mark Stenberg/Adweek）
item.description:
Mark Stenberg / Adweek:
LA Times, WSJ, and others are cutting their DC bureaus in an election year, as they focus on their core competencies that are likely better sources of return  —  An emphasis on subscriptions and changing coverage landscapes help explain  —  Both the Los Angeles Times and The Wall Street Journal …

item.title: アレックス・クーパー、スポティファイとの3年総額6,000万ドルの契約終了後、大ヒットインタビューポッドキャスト「Call Her Daddy」をすべての主要オーディオプラットフォームでリリース（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Alex Cooper releases her hit Call Her Daddy interview podcast on all major audio platforms, after its three year, $60M deal with Spotify ended  —  Daddy Gang, rejoice! … Full episodes of “Call Her Daddy” have been available only on Spotify since July 2021, under a three-year deal worth more than $60 million.

item.title: ミンスクの裁判所がフォトジャーナリストAliaksandr Ziankouに過激派容疑で3年の判決を下した。
item.description:
Committee to Protect Journalists:
A Minsk court sentences photojournalist Aliaksandr Ziankou to three years on extremism charges; Belarus was the world's third-worst jailer of reporters in 2023  —  New York, January 30, 2024—The Committee to Protect Journalists calls on Belarusian authorities to stop using extremism laws …

item.title: Paramount+は、コスト管理の一環として、一部の海外オリジナルコンテンツを削除し、米国外で制作される予定だった番組のデビューを見送る（Georg Szalai/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / Hollywood Reporter:
Paramount+ removes some international original content and will not debut some planned programming sourced outside the US as part of its goal to manage costs  —  Paramount Global's streamer will also not debut some planned programming, such as German anthology series 'Zeit Verbrechen …

item.title: 情報筋ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル紙は今週、ワシントン支局のリストラを計画している。
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Sources: The Wall Street Journal plans to restructure its Washington bureau this week, including making a small number of layoffs and adding some new roles  —  The Wall Street Journal is planning to restructure its Washington bureau this week, sources told Axios.

item.title: 電子メール：ソニー・インディアとジー社は、ジー社がロシアの資産を処分しなかったことや、14億ドルのディズニー・クリケットの放映権取引など、20以上のコンプライアンス問題で意見の相違があった（ロイター）。
item.description:
Reuters:
Emails: Sony India and Zee disagreed over 20+ compliance issues, including Zee's failure to dispose of Russian assets and its $1.4B Disney cricket rights deal  —  Sony and Zee disagreed over more than 20 compliance issues, including the Indian firm's failure to dispose of some Russian assets …

item.title: ルーシー・フレイザー英文化長官は、UAEが支援した入札に関する調査が終わるまで、テレグラフ・メディア・グループの所有権や支配権の変更を阻止する（Sam Nagarajan/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Sam Nagarajan / Bloomberg:
UK Culture Secretary Lucy Frazer blocks any changes to the ownership or control of the Telegraph Media Group pending an investigation into the UAE-backed bid  —  - Culture Secretary Lucy Frazer issues order in latest move  — UAE-backed consortium RedBirdIMI wants to buy the media group

item.title: メキシコ当局、1月22日に政府のコンピューターがハッキングされ、263人以上のジャーナリストの個人情報が不正アクセスされ、公開されたことを確認（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
Mexican authorities confirm that government computers were hacked on January 22 and the personal data on 263+ journalists was illegally accessed and released  —  The theft of the personal data of hundreds of journalists in Mexico, including addresses and copies of voter ID cards and passports …

item.title: USC：2023年、ビルボードのホット100シングルの35％が女性によって演奏され、最も人気のある曲の56％には少なくとも1人の女性ソングライターがいた（Ben Sisario/New York Times）。
item.description:
Ben Sisario / New York Times:
USC: in 2023, 35% of Billboard's Hot 100 singles in the US were performed by women and 56% of the most popular songs had at least one female songwriter  —  The Annenberg Inclusion Initiative's latest report finds that women's involvement in the biggest hits of 2023 was greatly improved over previous years.

item.title: 米国の刑事司法問題に関する報道を発表するために他の報道機関と提携しているギャリソン・プロジェクトの創設者兼EIC、イーサン・ブラウンへのインタビュー（Joshua Benton/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Joshua Benton / Nieman Lab:
An interview with Ethan Brown, founder and EIC of The Garrison Project, which partners with other outlets to publish its reporting on US criminal justice issues  —  “The story is less at [the U.S. Department of Justice] than with sheriffs and prosecutors at the local level, mostly the county level.”
